about.title: About the HAVATK Foundation
about.text: The HAVATK Foundation focuses on helping children who find themselves in difficult life situations. We provide each child with essential support, including food, clothing, and housing. We also support children with serious health conditions by funding medical procedures, therapy, and rehabilitation. We work closely with local organizations and medical institutions to ensure effective assistance. By organizing events and fundraising initiatives, we support our projects and improve the living conditions of children in need.

paragraphs: The HAVATK Foundation was established with a clear mission — to help children facing difficult life situations and to support them on their path to a better future. We believe that every child deserves the opportunity to grow up in safety, have space for personal development, and one day step confidently and courageously into adult life.

One of our key achievements was the completion of an outdoor sports ground built in cooperation with an orphanage, a primary school, and a secondary school in Dukhove. This space now serves as a place where children can spend time actively, play sports, meet others, share experiences, and build strong friendships. The sports ground has already become an important community hub that inspires children to move, grow, and achieve new victories.

The goal of our foundation is to provide long-term support to children during challenging periods of their lives and help them grow. We place special emphasis on education, a healthy lifestyle, and psychological well-being. Each of our projects is designed not only to ease current difficulties but also to bring real, tangible, and lasting value to children.
Together, we are already changing children’s lives for the better. Thank you for your support and for believing in our mission.

The HAVATK Foundation was established with a sincere desire to support children and create better conditions for their education and development. We are convinced that quality education is one of the key factors that helps children realize their potential and look confidently into the future.

As part of our activities, we are implementing a project to equip a primary school in Pilsen with modern electronic and interactive educational panels. These technologies significantly expand learning opportunities, making lessons more visual, engaging, and accessible for children with diverse educational needs.

Our goal is not only to provide technical equipment, but to make a real contribution to the development of a modern, high-quality, and inspiring educational environment. We strive for children to learn with interest, develop critical thinking, and gain knowledge in an environment that supports their growth and self-confidence.

responsibilities.title: What You Will Do
paragraphs: A fundraiser is a representative of the foundation who communicates with people in the city, talks about HAVATK’s projects, and inspires them to support children facing difficult life situations.
You will take part in meaningful work that brings tangible benefits and helps change children’s lives for the better.
